name: Supermodel Fashion Girls Salon
description:
Roll out the red carpet and put on your party dress because Supermodel Fashion Dress Up brings you all the glitz and glamour of the high life of supermodel right at home. In this game, you can dress up the models' new dresses, put on their makeup and style their hair. This is a makeover game with the latest face painting tools. Learn important beauty tips to use at your makeup salon. The dress up girl party is just getting started! Make the supermodel look more beautiful. Give them a proper haircut, makeover and party dress up for the red carpet party.


Show off your style with the makeovers and red carpet dresses. This game is great for face painting enthusiasts. You will get the chance to dress up dolls, do their make up and make elaborate salon hair styles. Little girls and teens will enjoy this dress up girl party game. Learn the latest beauty tips and apply them in your supermodel salon.
Play Supermodel Fashion Dress Up and witness the world of style and fashion. The makeup and makeover salon has the latest face painting tools and beauty tips to transform you into a star. It is the best dress up girl party game in town with designer red carpet dresses. Share this dress up game with your friends and enjoy learning all about makeup.


Features of Supermodel Fashion Dress Up:

- The latest makeover tools and fashion accessories!
- Stylish red carpet dresses for your characters!
- Beautiful and stunning environment!
- Easy and fun to play!
